# Testimonials

# John Byrtus

"The croissants are done perfectly. Flaky and buttery. It was the perfect butteriness where you don't need to add anything. the baguette was nice and crusty on the outside and had excellent chew"

# Anonymous

"One of our favorite destinations for some amazing baked choices"

# Rob Carter

"A boulangerie lifted straight from the streets of Paris!. After being spoiled by the incredibly delicious baguettes, croissants and others. I never thought I'd be able to find it right back at home!"
